page.title: 17ARTS + CRAFTS IN SHALBOURNE
page.content: There are several{amateur artists}in the village who use oils, water colours or pastels and who exhibit and sometimes sell their work. There is also a{potter,}a{sculptress}and a{wood {carver.}Many people use their skills and spare time to knit, crochet, embroider, make soft toys and dressmake; many of these articles are given to the numerous charity bazaars held in the village. In the winter two adult education classes are held in the village hall: a mixed media painting class and a chair caning and upholstery class. From time to time, other demonstrations in such things as cooking, cake icing, flower arranging etc take place in the village hall at the monthly Women's Institute gatherings. A talented{amateur {violinist}has a house here and gives occasional concerts.
